009package imagingbook.common.geometry.homography;

011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Random;
014
015import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction;
016import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction;
017import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
018import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
019import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
020import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
021import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
022import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
023import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
024
025import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
026import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntDouble;
027import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
028import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.ProjectiveMapping2D;
029import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
030
031/**
032 * This class defines methods for estimating the homography (projective)
033 * transformation between pairs of 2D point sets.
034 * It works in two steps:
035 * First, an initial estimate of the homography is obtained with the
036 * "direct linear transform" method.
037 * Second, iterative, non-linear Levenberg-Marquart (LM) optimization is applied
038 * to find the final fit.
039 *
040 * @author WB
041 * @version 2020/05/19
042 */
043public class HomographyEstimator {
044
045        private static int MaxLmEvaluations = 1000;
046        private static int MaxLmIterations = 1000;
047
048        private final boolean normalizePointCoordinates;
049        private final boolean doNonlinearRefinement;
050
051        // ------------------------------------------------------------
052
053        public HomographyEstimator() {
054                this(true, true);
055        }
056
057        public HomographyEstimator(boolean normalizePointCoordinates, boolean doNonlinearRefinement) {
058                this.normalizePointCoordinates = normalizePointCoordinates;
059                this.doNonlinearRefinement = doNonlinearRefinement;
060        }
061
062        // ------------------------------------------------------------
063
064        /**
065         * Estimates the homography (projective transformation) from two given 2D point sets
066         * and returns a {@linkplain ProjectiveMapping2D} instance.
067         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
068         * @param P the 1st sequence of 2D points 
069         * @param Q the 2nd sequence of 2D points
070         * @return the estimated homography (instance of type {@linkplain ProjectiveMapping2D})
071         */
072        public ProjectiveMapping2D getHomographyMapping(Pnt2d[] P, Pnt2d[] Q) {
073                RealMatrix H = getHomography(P, Q);
074                return new ProjectiveMapping2D(H.getData());
075        }
076
077        /**
078         * Estimates the homography (projective transformation) from two given 2D point sets.
079         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
080         * @param P the 1st sequence of 2D points 
081         * @param Q the 2nd sequence of 2D points
082         * @return the estimated homography (3 x 3 matrix)
083         */
084        public RealMatrix getHomography(Pnt2d[] P, Pnt2d[] Q) {
085                if (P.length != Q.length) {
086                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("getHomography(): P and Q must be of same length");
087                }
088                int n = P.length;
089                
090                // input point sets are normalized (to zero mean, unit variance) if required:
091                RealMatrix Id = MatrixUtils.createRealIdentityMatrix(3);
092                RealMatrix Na = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? MathUtil.getNormalisationMatrix(P) : Id;
093                RealMatrix Nb = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? MathUtil.getNormalisationMatrix(Q) : Id;  
094                RealMatrix M = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(n * 2, 9);
095
096                // find an initial solution using the DLT
097                for (int j = 0, r = 0; j < P.length; j++) {
098                        final double[] pA = MathUtil.transform(P[j].toDoubleArray(), Na);
099                        final double[] pB = MathUtil.transform(Q[j].toDoubleArray(), Nb);
100                        final double xA = pA[0];
101                        final double yA = pA[1];
102                        final double xB = pB[0];
103                        final double yB = pB[1];                        
104                        M.setRow(r + 0, new double[] {xA, yA, 1, 0, 0, 0, -(xA * xB), -(yA * xB), -(xB)});
105                        M.setRow(r + 1, new double[] {0, 0, 0, xA, yA, 1, -(xA * yB), -(yA * yB), -(yB)});
106                        r = r + 2;
107                }
108
109                // find h, such that M . h = 0:
110                double[] h = MathUtil.solveHomogeneousSystem(M).toArray();
111
112                // assemble homography matrix H from h:
113                RealMatrix H = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][] 
114                                {{h[0], h[1], h[2]},
115                                 {h[3], h[4], h[5]},
116                                 {h[6], h[7], h[8]}} );
117
118                // de-normalize the homography
119                if (normalizePointCoordinates) {
120                        H = MatrixUtils.inverse(Nb).multiply(H).multiply(Na);
121                }
122
123                // rescale M such that H[2][2] = 1 (unless H[2][2] close to 0)
124                if (Math.abs(H.getEntry(2, 2)) > 10e-8) {
125                        H = H.scalarMultiply(1.0 / H.getEntry(2, 2));
126                }
127                else {
128                        throw new RuntimeException("estimateHomography(): H could not be normalized");
129                }
130
131                // refine the solution using non-linear optimization if required
132                return doNonlinearRefinement ? refineHomography(H, P, Q) : H;
133        }
134
135        /**
136         * Estimates the homographies between a fixed set of 2D model points and
137         * multiple observations (image point sets).
138         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
139         * TODO: This should not be here.
140         * @param modelPts a sequence of 2D points on the model (calibration target)
141         * @param obsPoints a sequence 2D image point sets (one set per view).
142         * @return the sequence of estimated homographies (3 x 3 matrices), one for each view
143         * @deprecated
144         */
145        public RealMatrix[] getHomographies(Pnt2d[] modelPts, Pnt2d[][] obsPoints) {
146                final int M = obsPoints.length;
147                RealMatrix[] homographies = new RealMatrix[M];
148                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
149                        homographies[i] = getHomography(modelPts, obsPoints[i]);
150                }
151                return homographies;
152        }
153
154        /**
155         * Refines the initial homography by non-linear (Levenberg-Marquart) optimization.
156         * @param Hinit the initial (estimated) homography matrix
157         * @param pntsA the 1st sequence of 2D points 
158         * @param pntsB the 2nd sequence of 2D points
159         * @return the refined homography matrix
160         */
161        private static RealMatrix refineHomography(RealMatrix Hinit, Pnt2d[] pntsA, Pnt2d[] pntsB) {
162                final int M = pntsA.length;             
163                double[] observed = new double[2 * M];
164                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
165                        observed[i * 2 + 0] = pntsB[i].getX();
166                        observed[i * 2 + 1] = pntsB[i].getY();
167                }                       
168                MultivariateVectorFunction value = getValueFunction(pntsA);
169                MultivariateMatrixFunction jacobian = getJacobianFunction(pntsA);
170
171                LeastSquaresProblem problem = LeastSquaresFactory.create(
172                                LeastSquaresFactory.model(value, jacobian),
173                                MatrixUtils.createRealVector(observed), 
174                                MathUtil.getRowPackedVector(Hinit), 
175                                // TODO: add weight matrix (diagonal)?
176                                null,  // ConvergenceChecker -- do we need one?
177                                MaxLmEvaluations, 
178                                MaxLmIterations);
179
180                LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer lm = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();
181                Optimum result = lm.optimize(problem);
182
183                RealVector optimum = result.getPoint();
184                RealMatrix Hopt = MathUtil.fromRowPackedVector(optimum, 3, 3);
185                int iterations = result.getIterations();
186                if (iterations >= MaxLmIterations) {
187                        throw new RuntimeException("refineHomography(): max. number of iterations exceeded");
188                }
189                //System.out.println("LM optimizer iterations " + iterations);
190                return Hopt.scalarMultiply(1.0 / Hopt.getEntry(2, 2));
191        }
192
193
194        private static MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction(Pnt2d[] X) {
195                //System.out.println("MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction");
196                return new MultivariateVectorFunction() {
197                        
198                        @Override
199                        public double[] value(double[] h) {                     
200                                final double[] Y = new double[X.length * 2];
201                                for (int j = 0; j < X.length; j++) {
202                                        final double x = X[j].getX();
203                                        final double y = X[j].getY();
204                                        final double w = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
205                                        Y[j * 2 + 0] = (h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2]) / w;
206                                        Y[j * 2 + 1] = (h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5]) / w;
207                                }
208                                return Y;
209                        }
210                };
211        }
212
213        private static MultivariateMatrixFunction getJacobianFunction(Pnt2d[] X) {
214                return new MultivariateMatrixFunction() {
215                        
216                        @Override
217                        public double[][] value(double[] h) {
218                                final double[][] J = new double[2 * X.length][];
219                                for (int i = 0; i < X.length; i++) {
220                                        final double x = X[i].getX();
221                                        final double y = X[i].getY();
222
223                                        final double w  = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
224                                        final double w2 = w * w;
225
226                                        final double sx = h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2];           
227                                        J[2 * i + 0] = new double[] {x/w, y/w, 1/w, 0, 0, 0, -sx*x/w2, -sx*y/w2, -sx/w2};
228
229                                        final double sy = h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5];
230                                        J[2 * i + 1] = new double[] {0, 0, 0, x/w, y/w, 1/w, -sy*x/w2, -sy*y/w2, -sy/w2};
231                                }
232                                return J;
233                        }
234                };
235        }
236
237        /*

329
330        // TESTING --------------------------------------------------------
331
332        static double NOISE = 0.1;
333
334        private static Pnt2d mapPoint(RealMatrix H, Pnt2d p) {
335                double[] xa = p.toDoubleArray(); // {p.getX(), p.getY()};
336                double[] xb = MathUtil.transform(xa, H);
337                return PntDouble.from(xb);
338        }
339
340        private static Random rand = new Random();
341
342        private static Pnt2d mapPointWithNoise(RealMatrix H, Pnt2d p, double noise) {
343                double[] xa = {p.getX(), p.getY()};
344                double[] xb = MathUtil.transform(xa, H);
345                double xn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
346                double yn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
347                return PntDouble.from(xb[0] + xn, xb[1] + yn);
348        }
349
350        /**
351         * Used for testing only.
352         * @param args ignored
353         */
354        public static void main(String[] args) {
355                RealMatrix Hreal = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][]
356                                {{3, 2, -1},
357                        {5, 0, 2},
358                        {4, 4, 9}});
359
360                System.out.println("H (real) = ");
361                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.scalarMultiply(1/Hreal.getEntry(2, 2)).getData()));
362                //              System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.getData()));
363
364                List<Pnt2d> pntlistA = new ArrayList<Pnt2d>();
365                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(10, 7));
366                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(3, -1));
367                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(5, 5));
368                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(-6, 13));
369                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(0, 1));
370                pntlistA.add(PntInt.from(2, 3));
371
372                List<Pnt2d> pntlistB = new ArrayList<Pnt2d>();
373                for (Pnt2d a : pntlistA) {
374                        pntlistB.add(mapPointWithNoise(Hreal, a, NOISE));
375                }
376
377                Pnt2d[] pntsA = pntlistA.toArray(new Pnt2d[0]);
378                Pnt2d[] pntsB = pntlistB.toArray(new Pnt2d[0]);
379
380
381                System.out.println("\nPoint correspondences:");
382                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
383                        Pnt2d a = pntsA[i];
384                        Pnt2d b = pntsB[i];
385                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f)\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), b.getX(), b.getY());
386                }
387                System.out.println();
388
389                System.out.println("\n*************** WITHOUT NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
390                runTestDLT(new HomographyEstimator(true, false), pntsA, pntsB);
391
392                System.out.println("\n*************** WITH NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
393                runTestDLT(new HomographyEstimator(true, true), pntsA, pntsB);
394
395                System.out.println("\n*************** USING LEAST-SQUARES MAPPING *****************");
396                runTestLeastSquares(pntsA, pntsB);
397
398                System.out.println("\n*************** GENERATE A MAPPING *****************");
399                ProjectiveMapping2D pm = new HomographyEstimator().getHomographyMapping(pntsA, pntsB);
400                System.out.println("projective mapping = \n" + pm.toString());
401
402        }
403
404        private static void runTestDLT(HomographyEstimator he, Pnt2d[] pntsA, Pnt2d[] pntsB) {
405                RealMatrix Hest = he.getHomography(pntsA, pntsB);
406
407                System.out.println("H (estim.) = "); 
408                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hest.getData()));
409
410                Pnt2d[] pntsC = new Pnt2d[pntsA.length];
411                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
412                        pntsC[i] = mapPoint(Hest, pntsA[i]);
413                }
414
415                System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
416                double sumDist2 = 0;
417                double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
418                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
419                        Pnt2d a = pntsA[i];
420                        Pnt2d b = pntsB[i];
421                        Pnt2d c = pntsC[i];
422                        double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
423                        sumDist2 += dist2;
424                        maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
425                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
426                }
427                System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
428                System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));   
429        }
430
431        private static void runTestLeastSquares(Pnt2d[] pntsA, Pnt2d[] pntsB) {
432                ProjectiveMapping2D mapping = ProjectiveMapping2D.fromPoints(pntsA, pntsB);
433                double[][] Hmap = mapping.getTransformationMatrix();
434                System.out.println("H (mapping) = "); 
435                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hmap));
436                {
437                        Pnt2d[] pntsC = new Pnt2d[pntsA.length];
438                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
439                                pntsC[i] = //(Pnt2d) 
440                                        mapping.applyTo(PntDouble.from(pntsA[i]));
441//                                      mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.PntDouble.from(pntsA[i].getX(), pntsA[i].getY()));
442                        }
443
444                        System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
445                        double sumDist2 = 0;
446                        double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
447                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
448                                Pnt2d a = pntsA[i];
449                                Pnt2d b = pntsB[i];
450                                Pnt2d c = pntsC[i];
451                                double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
452                                sumDist2 += dist2;
453                                maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
454                                System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
455                        }
456                        System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
457                        System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));
458                }
459                {
460                        System.out.println("   +++ running refinement ++++");
461                        RealMatrix Hinit = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(Hmap);
462                        RealMatrix Hest = refineHomography(Hinit, pntsA, pntsB);
463                        System.out.println("H (estim.) = "); 
464                        System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hest.getData()));
465
466                        Pnt2d[] pntsC = new Pnt2d[pntsA.length];
467                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
468                                pntsC[i] = mapPoint(Hest, pntsA[i]);
469                        }
470
471                        //                      System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
472                        double sumDist2 = 0;
473                        double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
474                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
475                                @SuppressWarnings("unused")
476                                Pnt2d a = pntsA[i];
477                                Pnt2d b = pntsB[i];
478                                Pnt2d c = pntsC[i];
479                                double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
480                                sumDist2 += dist2;
481                                maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
482                                //                              System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
483                        }
484                        System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
485                        System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));   
486                }
487        }
488
489}
